overview: Experience engineer with strong delivery capabilities, experience in all stages of a product development life-cycle, strong development process coordination capabilities, skilled with defining technology strategies based on product requirements, experience in working and delivering in chaotic and constrained environment, Strong interpersonal communication skills, Up-to-date knowledge of technology standards, industry trends, emerging technologies and software development best practices, strong skills in identifying and evaluating technologies that are most appropriate for successful delivering of company’s mission, strong skills in planning and prioritizing of development initiatives.
